title: Potions
content: tched from the shadows, taking upon rest. Smells like a sleep potion turned sour. Potion of Flying Drink to gain a flying speed of 60ft for one hour. The bottle feels lighter than if it were empty Potion of Acid Resistance Gain resistance to acid damage until your next long rest. Despite its reputation as a chalky and unappetising brew, a pleasing effervescence makes this potion easy to drink. Auntie Ethel's Charm Break this charm to receive all benefits from the Enhance Ability Spell until Long
